page.title: 13EMERGENCY SERVICES 1
page.content: The{Crieff fire station}is {part-time.}It is manned for 1 day each week. There are 16 firemen who are required to attend the fire station for training and parade for 1 night each week. There are 2 Dodge fire engines at the station. They carry a 1/3 of a mile of spare hose on each call, and have to cover an area bordered by {Comrie, Auchterarder, Dundee}and {Perth. In such an area as the Estate the worst time for fire is the Summer as there are bale fires, forest fires, and fires involving farm animals. The station deals with roughly 82 calls a year and the firemen in Crieff are notified by a personal bleeper. It takes them about 10 minutes to reach the Estate on an emergency call.
